creator: niallp@apache.org
text:
A number of the Tomcat6 source files either are missing the source file header
or haven't been converted to comply with the new policy (without the Copyright
statement).

http://www.apache.org/legal/src-headers.html

Also the NOTICE file doesn't contain the appropriate Copyright statements as per
that policy.

Attaching a patch for most of the issues. Some files had much more "noise" than
they should have had because the svn:eol-style property was not set to "native".

Also I didn't change DirectJDKLog which included someone elses copyright. Also
none of the source files in javax.mail.* and javax.mail.internet.* have source
file headers - but I wasn't sure what the

Created attachment 20012
Corrections to Source File Headers for Tomcat6
creator: niallp@apache.org

text: This has since been fixed using the insert_license.pl script.
creator: markt@apache.org
